outputs.output_descr: The prime objective of the programme is to improve the lives of the targeted rural communities through the provision of basic infrastructures that focus on promoting food security and related livelihood schemes at the grassroot levels.

project_descr: Food Security & Sustainable Livelihood Programme in Zoba Maekel with the Ministry of Agriculture
project_title: Microdam Based Water Scheme in Zoba Maekel
